name: elab2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0))

stmt.origin: elab2g(s0, c0, universe, c1, w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: elab2g(s0, c0, universe, c1, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c1, cab(s0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c1, cab(s0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Membership in a class abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-1995.)
